name: Revenue
description: Wherein is recorded the assets earned by a company’s operations and business activities.

name: Expense
description: Where the costs incurred by the company, in order to generate revenue are recorded.

name: Asset
description: Where the debit and credit amounts from the company’s transactions involving the company’s resources are recorded.

name: Liability
description: Where the debt, obligations, customer deposits, customer repayments and certain deferred income taxes for the company are recorded.

name: Equity
description: Equity is the amount funded by the backers and shareholders of the company for its initial start-up and continuous operation.

name: COGS
description: The carrying value of goods sold during a particular period.
